00051 ChaikinCurveApproximation::ChaikinCurveApproximation() {
00052 
00053 }

00056 
00057 }

00060 }
00061 
00062 void ChaikinCurveApproximation::approximate(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& in, std::vector <FrameWithId>& out, unsigned int lod) {
00063 #ifdef DEBUG
00064     Stopwatch stopwatch;
00065     stopwatch.start();
00066 #endif
00067     std::vector <FrameWithId> inputCopy;
00068     inputCopy = in;
00069     unsigned int counter = 0;
00070     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < lod; ++i) {
00071         out.clear();
00072         counter += chaikinCurve(inputCopy, out);
00073         inputCopy = out;
00074     }
00075 #ifdef DEBUG  
00076     stopwatch.stop();
00077     LOG("Chaikin curve approximation algorithm:");
00078     LOG("  - input size: %lu", in.size());
00079     LOG("  - level of detail: %d", lod);
00080     LOG("  - output size: %lu", out.size());
00081     LOG("  - iterations : %d", counter);
00082     LOG("  - duration : %f ms", stopwatch.getElapsedTime());
00083 #endif    
00084 }
00085 
00086 void ChaikinCurveApproximation::approximate(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& in, std::vector <FrameWithId>& out) {
00087 
00088     approximate(in, out, 1);
00089 }
00090 
00091 unsigned int ChaikinCurveApproximation::chaikinCurve(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& pointList,
00092         std::vector <FrameWithId>& resultList) {
00093 
00094     if (pointList.size() == 0)
00095         return 0;
00096 
00097     unsigned int counter = 0;
00098     // keep the first point
00099     resultList.push_back(pointList[0]);
00100 
00101     double k = 0.75;
00102     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < (pointList.size() - 1); ++i) {
00103         ++counter;
00104         // get 2 original points
00105         const KDL::Frame& p0 = pointList[i].getFrame();
00106         std::string p0Id = pointList[i].id;
00107         const KDL::Frame& p1 = pointList[i + 1].getFrame();
00108         std::string p1Id = pointList[i + 1].id;
00109         KDL::Frame Q;
00110         KDL::Frame R;
00111 
00112         // average the 2 original points to create 2 new points. For each
00113         // CV, another 2 verts are created.
00114         Q.p.x(k * p0.p.x() + (1 - k) * p1.p.x());
00115         Q.p.y(k * p0.p.y() + (1 - k) * p1.p.y());
00116         Q.p.z(k * p0.p.z() + (1 - k) * p1.p.z());
00117 
00118         R.p.x((1 - k) * p0.p.x() + k * p1.p.x());
00119         R.p.y((1 - k) * p0.p.y() + k * p1.p.y());
00120         R.p.z((1 - k) * p0.p.z() + k * p1.p.z());
00121 
00122         resultList.push_back(FrameWithId(Q, p0Id));
00123         resultList.push_back(FrameWithId(R, p1Id));
00124     }
00125     // keep the last point
00126     resultList.push_back(pointList[pointList.size() - 1]);
00127     return counter;
00128 }
